sense.def:
To condense a piece of writing or speech
pomeni skrajšati besedilo ali govor, tako da črtamo manj pomembne odlomke.

seg.quote: I tried to condense every report into as few words as possible.

sense.def:
Kadar plin ali para
condenses
, ali kadar človek
condenses gas or vapour
, se spremenita v tekočino.
